title: More options(customisable) for new in game hud
body: So i have two main concerns that are frustrating during gameplay so 1st is the minimap charging/flashing onto me minimap and taking your camera view to that location(i have click on minimap to move disabled so no longer running to that location) as for the minimap on "left" option id like to see minimap on top right/top left as your rarely ever clicking in those locations 2nd concern is skills text is absolutely HUGE way tooo big than what it needs to be so a scaling option for that would be nice also hovering over a monster, that text takes up even more space than skills text
